title: New romance
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Bill Brind, Janet Walczewski and Susan Gabori
brief_description: Finely drawn study of the social aspects of heterosexual and homosexual relationships and asks whether people have a right to think, feel and act differently. Excellent use of locational interviews, cartoons and meaningful dialogue and opens up a subject that is often misunderstood.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Bill Brind, Janet Walczewski and Susan Gabori
